Question 43.Question: Why didnâ€™t you use GenAI for feedback on your work?
Question 43.Response: it has never occurred to me to do so, but i think it would decrease the quality of written work to more of a high school standard judging by how it responds to other things like coming up with ideas. i think my writing (particularly legal writing) is more eloquent and complex than what GenAI would suggest.
